definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通過專項整治，再現京城水系和古典園林的歷史風貌。

sentences.english: Gardens in Japan, though of Chinese parentage, have more conventions and less complexity in lay-out than the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 日本園林，雖然源於中國，佈局的習俗化大於複雜化。

sentences.english: Chinese gardens can be divided into two categories,  the imperial and the private.
sentences.chinese: 中國園林可分爲御花園和私家花園兩類。

sentences.english: The surface of the second view, namely macroscopic observation garden stone structure.
sentences.chinese: 二觀，即肉眼觀察園林石的表面結構。

sentences.english: Shanghai classical garden enjoys a long history and has achieved great accomplishment in gardening art.
sentences.chinese: 上海園林歷史悠久，在造園藝術上取得了很高成就。

sentences.english: Most gardens in Suzhou used to be private residences.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州的大多數園林過去是私人宅第。

sentences.english: The important actions of gardens in art creation are elaborated.
sentences.chinese: 說明了園林點景在園林藝術創作過程中的重要作用。

sentences.english: If you would be happy all your life, plant a garden.
sentences.chinese: 假如你想一生幸福，就種植一個園林。

sentences.english: Used in garden landscape stone add vitality.
sentences.chinese: 在園林庭院內使用景觀石可增添生機活力。

sentences.english: Pyracantha also right in the application of the garden to investigate and summarized.
sentences.chinese: 同時還對火棘在園林中應用情況進行調查並歸納總結。

sentences.english: Warlords built private gardens in Chinese and west styles with literatus' help.
sentences.chinese: 武人在文人的幫助之下建設有中西合璧的私家園林。

sentences.english: Towns in the populous trees, with hanging gardens of verdure.
sentences.chinese: 熙熙攘攘的城鎮，懸吊着翠綠的園林。

sentences.english: Conservation-oriented landscape is an important part of the society.
sentences.chinese: 節約型園林綠化是建設節約型社會的重要內容。

sentences.english: The application of ground cover plant in landscaping was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並且探討了地被植物在園林綠化中的應用。

sentences.english: The urban landscape of common foliage plants.
sentences.chinese: 是城市園林綠化中常見的觀葉植物。

definition: mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
